definition: again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before

sentences.english: We need messiahs. The Second Comingevent is Messianic!
sentences.chinese: 耶穌再臨事件是彌賽亞的。

sentences.english: Now that the Second Coming event is so close, it is time to come out of disguise.
sentences.chinese: 現在耶穌再臨事件很近了，是時候顯露真身了。

sentences.english: A storm is only as the outskirts of His robe, the symptom of His advent, the environment of His presence.
sentences.chinese: 風浪是神義袍的邊襟，再臨的徵候，同在的證據。

definition: to write off at one stroke
to touch base matter and turn it to gold (idiom); fig. to turn crude writing into a literary gem
El Niño (meteorology)/Holy Infant (cf biblical nativity story)
lit. bashing sideways and colliding straight on (idiom); to push through shoving and bumping/to barge/to charge around violently
to be at the highest level of enlightenment (Buddhist expression)
contract of alliance/oath or treaty between allies
to transmit Buddhist teaching/chakram or chakka (throwing disk)
to run a newspaper/to publish a newspaper
